channel.title: Ints help needed (not the same thing!)
channel.description:
i need to know how to make an item go with the players hand (ex. when player hits the sword just floats in the air in the same place as before hitting)
THANK YOU!(cuz if this helps me i can add my completely own models succesfully!)
